remarks: A version of ~ rspcev using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:
rspcegf.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
rspcegf.2 $e |- F/_ x A $.
rspcegf.3 $e |- F/_ x B $.
rspcegf.4 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rspcegf $p |- ( ( A e. B /\ ps ) -> E. x e. B ph ) $.
